SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_product_resources WHERE P_Resources_ID=@@P_Resources_ID@@,Product_ID=@@Product_ID@@,P_Resources_Name_CH=@@P_Resources_Name_CH@@,P_Resources_Name_HK=@@P_Resources_Name_HK@@,P_Resources_URL=@@P_Resources_URL@@,P_Resources_Type=@@P_Resources_Type@@,P_Resources_Status=@@P_Resources_Status@@,P_Resources_Seq=@@P_Resources_Seq@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@; SELECT P_Resources_ID,Product_ID,P_Resources_Name_CH,P_Resources_Name_HK,P_Resources_URL,P_Resources_Type,P_Resources_Status,P_Resources_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_product_resources WHERE P_Resources_ID=@@P_Resources_ID@@,Product_ID=@@Product_ID@@,P_Resources_Name_CH=@@P_Resources_Name_CH@@,P_Resources_Name_HK=@@P_Resources_Name_HK@@,P_Resources_URL=@@P_Resources_URL@@,P_Resources_Type=@@P_Resources_Type@@,P_Resources_Status=@@P_Resources_Status@@,P_Resources_Seq=@@P_Resources_Seq@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@ LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ;
